charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking the
beach, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard the sound of a bass guitar and
someone singing loudly in the distance.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_0200:
Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed toward the music
and eventually discovered the culprits—
Roxie and her Whirlipede.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0300:
Oh! Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Did we catch your attention with
our little jam session?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_0700:
Aw, you don’t gotta be shy!
Come on—I’m positive you heard us.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0800:
If you ever wanna get into music, we should
totally form a band. I mean, we’re already
on the same team, right?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_0900: Come on! Sing a little something for me!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1300:
You don’t gotta be nervous!
Nobody’ll laugh at you—I promise!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1400:
So, what kind of song are you
gonna sing for me?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_1600:
Haha! I knew you had rock music
in your soul! I love heavy metal, too!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_1800:
Haha! I kinda figured you would
sing something like that!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_1900: Well, come on! Let’s hear it!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_2000:
After a moment, [Name:PlayerNickname ]
cleared [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] throat and started to sing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2100:
Well, I think you might have made
a fan outta Whirlipede!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2200:
You know, listening to you sing kinda put
my heart at ease, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2300:
That kind, fun personality of yours
really came through in your singing!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2400:
Buuut...I feel like being in a band
might not really be your thing.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_2600: No no! That’s not what I meant!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_2900:
Argh! I’m saying it all wrong...
Just listen to me for a sec!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1101_3000:
At once, Roxie launched into a heavy bass riff.
[Name:PlayerNickname ] felt the deep sound
echo in [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] chest, making [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] heart beat faster.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3100:
I think...you’re thinking about it
too much, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3200:
I mean, when I jam, I JAM! Sometimes I rock out 
and headbang so hard, I forget my own name!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3300:
When I heard you sing, it kinda
made me realize something.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3400:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
I think Pokémon battling is your jam!
It’s where you’re most in your element!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3500:
So, I guess it might sound a little
selfish of me to say this, but...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_3600:
I’d much rather see you stand up on stage
and battle it out next to your Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0301_3700:
I get what you mean.
Will you root for me, then?
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0401_3800:
Duh! I’ll be cheering for you from the
front row! That’s what friends are for!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0302_3900:
Guess we should have a
battle soon, then!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_0402_4100:
Just you wait—we’re gonna blast away
the competition! Kaboom!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4200:
You know, I’ve got loads of fans
that love and support my music...
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2301_1201_4300:
but when it comes to Trainers,
I’m YOUR biggest fan!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0100:
Heyyy, I know you. You sing in that Koffing
band from Unova, don’t you!
♪ P-O-K-E-M-O-N! Pokémon! ♪
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0200:
Dude, your music cuts right to my soul!
It gets stuck in my head for days. I love it!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0300:
Whoa, you listen to our music? Rad!
Whirlipede and I love meeting our fans.
We should get to know each other better.
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0400:
Totally. We usually kinda go with the flow,
wherever the wind takes us... But when it
comes to Pokémon battling, we go all out!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_1201_0500:
I’m picking up what you’re putting down...
Let’s let our battle skills do the talking!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0101_0100:
All right, then! Time for Mina to show you
her full power! Kaboom!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0101_0200:
Come on, then! Whirlipede and I are gonna
blow your minds!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0100:
Whoa, you guys are intense!
I feel like I just got rocked to my core!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0200:
You two rock pretty hard yourselves!
I’d love to battle again sometime!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0300:
Huh? What’s wrong, Whirlipede?
Wait... No way!
charaepi_ch0011_00_homika/2311_0501_0400:
You’re evolving, aren’t you?! You want to grow
stronger—I can feel the energy coming off
you in waves!
